title: Large Animated Gif
synopsis: You can use large animated gifs, but keep in mind the entire page size must stay below 2MB at this point to fork on some platforms (Windows seems too have a 2MB limit on posting, Linux has no problems, Macs I am unsure.)

title: Welcome Visitors
synopsis: Welcome to the [[Smallest Federated Wiki]]. From this page you can find who we are and what we do. New sites provide this information and then claim the site as their own. You will need your own site to participate.
